title: Firefox is preventing me from booking a flight online.
content: I've tried to book flights repeatedly online and Firefox is preventing it. How do I nknow? because I went to Safari and the bookings went straight through. Same bookings, same sites.
creator: dtraer

title: Sync with Securly not working
content:
I use Firefox on many computers in many locations and they all use the account sync feature. However, at one location, a school, there's a filtering system in place called Securly. To get through the school filters, you have to download a certificate and install it. I do that, and web browsing works fine. But, syncing does not work. It's as if the syncing feature doesn't use the installed certificate. So, to sync, I have to use my phone hot-spot from time-to-time. It's a big pain, however, when I've set or changed a password at the school and expect it to be available in all my other computers but I've forgotten to do the manual sync before I left. Is there a way to get the sync process to use the installed certificate?

Thanks!

-Farren
creator: farren

title: HTML5 Mediaplayer
content: When assigning a URL to the mediaplayer object it started appending the current path to the URL. Did not do that in prior version. You can see it automatically puts the current browsing URL and then the URL that is assigned. So the file will not load. GET https://www.swingtechnologies.com/https://www.swingtechnologies.com/UploadVideos/clarkj@pobox.com/S200629_019 A.mp4 [HTTP/2 404 8ms]
creator: swingviewpro
